Q01_sobreganancias.statement: Las grandes empresas y mineras deben pagar mas impuestos cuando tienen ganancias extraordinarias

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. Pro-business ideology, historically opposed to additional corporate taxes. FP defends current tax structure.

peru_libre.reasoning: No explicit 2026 promise found. However, PL's Marxist-Leninist ideology and 2021 platform strongly support taxing extractive industries. Consistent with statist economic policy.

renovacion_popular.reasoning: RP-2026-015 explicitly wants to REDUCE IGV. Anti-tax increase stance. Lopez Aliaga's platform is pro-business, reduce taxes to incentivize formalization.

avanza_pais.reasoning: No explicit promise. APAIS platform focuses on private investment (APAIS-2026-020, APAIS-2026-029). Pro-investment stance incompatible with windfall taxes.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: No explicit promise. APP is centrist, focused on regional development and infrastructure. No clear stance on corporate taxation.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP's 2026 plan focuses on water and infrastructure (SP-2026-001 to 023). No fiscal policy on corporate taxes.

podemos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. PP-2026-003 mentions restructuring SUNAT but for collection efficiency, not windfall taxes.

juntos_peru.reasoning: EXPLICIT: JP-2026-002 states 'Aplicar impuesto a las sobreganancias'. Direct match to quiz statement.

partido_morado.reasoning: No explicit promise. PM's 2026 plan focuses on health and justice digitalization. No fiscal policy on corporate taxes.

Q02_tlcs.statement: El Peru debe revisar los tratados de libre comercio para proteger la industria nacional

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. FP is historically pro-free trade, supported TLCs during Fujimori era. Pro-market economic policy.

peru_libre.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PL-2026-049 states 'Auditoria integral y soberana de los Tratados de Libre Comercio y acuerdos estrategicos antes del 2028'. Also PL-2026-048 mentions 'politica exterior multipolar y no alineada'.

renovacion_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. RP focuses on domestic issues (security, taxes, infrastructure). No clear TLC stance in 2026 plan.

avanza_pais.reasoning: EXPLICIT OPPOSITE: APAIS-2026-031 states 'Lograr 5 nuevos acuerdos comerciales estrategicos internacionales'. Pro-trade expansion, not revision.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: No explicit promise. APP is pro-investment (APP-2026-019 'Promover inversion en todas sus formas'). Aligned with free trade.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP's 2026 plan has no trade policy mentions.

podemos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. PP's plan focuses on economic growth through investment, no TLC stance.

juntos_peru.reasoning: EXPLICIT: JP-2026-003 states 'Renegociar Tratados de Libre Comercio que afecten la soberania nacional'. Direct match.

partido_morado.reasoning: No explicit promise. PM's plan focuses on health/justice, no trade policy.

Q03_petroperu.statement: PetroPeru debe operar directamente pozos de petroleo en lugar de empresas privadas

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. FP is pro-privatization, historically supported private sector in extractive industries. Against state enterprise expansion.

peru_libre.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PL-2026-024 states 'Petroperu operando al menos 3 lotes estrategicos al 2031'. Direct match to quiz statement.

renovacion_popular.reasoning: RP-2026-010 wants to 'Reducir el numero de ministerios por eficiencia'. Anti-state expansion ideology. Pro-private sector.

avanza_pais.reasoning: APAIS-2026-017 'Simplificar procesos de licitacion y fortalecer ProInversion'. Pro-private investment, not state operation.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: APP-2026-019 'Promover la inversion privada en todas sus formas'. Pro-private sector stance.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP's plan focuses on water/energy but no PetroPer√∫ mention. SP-2026-017 to 020 focus on renewables, not oil.

podemos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. PP's plan mentions economic growth but no stance on state oil companies.

juntos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. However, JP's left platform and alliance with PL suggests alignment with state control of strategic resources. Anti-privatization stance.

partido_morado.reasoning: No explicit promise. PM's plan has no energy/oil policy.

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. FP historically supports labor flexibility for businesses. Opposed to expanding union power.

peru_libre.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PL-2026-010 'Aprobar una Nueva Ley General del Trabajo que restituya los derechos laborales recortados y fortalezca la negociacion colectiva'. Also PL-2026-011 'Incrementar cobertura de convenios colectivos'. Direct match.

renovacion_popular.reasoning: RP-2026-009 'Eliminar barreras burocraticas mediante simplificacion administrativa'. Pro-business deregulation stance, not pro-union.

avanza_pais.reasoning: APAIS-2026-004 'Redactar un nuevo Codigo del Trabajo y Prevision Social'. New labor code but unclear if pro-union. APAIS-2026-007 mentions 'Microcontratos Formales Flexibles' suggesting flexibility over union power.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: No explicit promise. APP's plan focuses on regional development, no labor policy.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP's plan has no labor/union policy.

podemos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. PP-2026-009 to 011 mention employment but focus on job creation, not union rights.

juntos_peru.reasoning: No explicit 2026 promise. However, JP is left-wing party aligned with workers' movements. Historically pro-union stance.

partido_morado.reasoning: No explicit promise. PM's plan focuses on health/justice, no labor policy. PM-2026-012 mentions 'formalizacion laboral' but not union rights.

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit promise. FP historically defends private pension system (AFPs). Created during Fujimori government.

peru_libre.reasoning: No explicit 2026 promise. However, PL's 2021 platform called for state pension system. Consistent with statist social policy.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: No explicit promise. APP's plan has no pension policy.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP's plan has no pension policy.

podemos_peru.reasoning: PP-2026-022 'Lograr que 7 de cada 10 adultos mayores cuenten con una pension al 2031'. Pension coverage goal but unclear if AFP reform or state system.

juntos_peru.reasoning: No explicit 2026 promise. However, JP is left-wing, historically critical of AFP system. Aligned with state social protection.

partido_morado.reasoning: No explicit promise. PM's plan has no pension policy.

Q07_salud_publica.statement: El gobierno debe expandir significativamente el sistema publico de salud con mas hospitales, medicos y cobertura universal

juntos_peru.reasoning: EXPLICIT: JP-2026-010 'Destinar 8% del PBI a salud' (ONLY party with explicit % target). JP-2026-007 'Incrementar vacantes para carreras de salud'. JP-2026-012 '70% de Redes Integradas de Salud operativas'. Strongest public health commitment.

peru_libre.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PL-2026-028 'Implementar el programa Medicos de la Familia a nivel nacional priorizando zonas rurales, periurbanas y amazonicas al 2031'. PL-2026-047 'Asignar un equipo de Medicos de la Familia a cada territorio'. Major public health expansion.

partido_morado.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PM-2026-004 'Lograr 100% de establecimientos de primer nivel con telemedicina integrada'. PM-2026-009 'Implementar telemedicina integrada en 100%'. PM-2026-010 'Formar 10,000 articuladores de salud'. Clear expansion promises.

podemos_peru.reasoning: EXPLICIT: PP-2026-026 'Lograr que 80% o mas de personas reciban atencion de salud efectiva al 2031'. PP-2026-027 'Reducir prevalencia de anemia a 0%'. PP-2026-028 'Reducir desnutricion infantil a 8%'. Coverage expansion goals.

renovacion_popular.reasoning: EXPLICIT: RP-2026-007 'Dotar y fortalecer las Postas Medicas con infraestructura y profesionales'. RP-2026-005 'Programa alimenticio basado en proteinas para erradicar desnutricion infantil'. Infrastructure expansion.

fuerza_popular.reasoning: No explicit EXPANSION promise. FP has 17 health promises but ALL focus on EFFICIENCY (FP-2026-015 separation of functions, FP-2026-033 public-private choice, FP-2026-016 digital records). No explicit budget increase or expansion commitment. PPP model, not state expansion.

avanza_pais.reasoning: No explicit expansion promise. APAIS-2026-022 'Establecer seguro de salud complementario con transferencia condicionada' is MARKET-BASED approach (conditional transfers, complementary insurance), not public system expansion.

alianza_progreso.reasoning: No explicit health system promise. APP-2026-010 'Incrementar poblacion que realiza actividad fisica' is about EXERCISE, not health system expansion. Only health-adjacent promise.

somos_peru.reasoning: No explicit promise. SP has 0 health promises in 2026 plan (see extraction_stats: salud=0). Plan focuses on water and energy infrastructure.
